body:
The things that were going to become Go1.5.3 were bumped to Go1.5.4 (https://github.com/golang/go/issues?q=milestone%3AGo1.5.4) so Go1.5.3 would be purely a security release. But the commit for Go 1.5.3 never had an issue with that milestone. 

They were backports of #13907 and #13515 (both Milestone Go 1.6)
